name: decko
description: A collection of the most useful property decorators.

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && babel -f src/decko.js -s -o $npm_package_main < src/decko.js && npm run build:ts
scripts.test: npm run test:ts && eslint {src,tests}/**.js && mocha --compilers js:babel/register tests/**/*.js
scripts.release: npm run build && git commit -am $npm_package_version && git tag $npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
